bibl.title: Letter from A.S. von Mansfelde to Mabel H. Lazear, January 14, 1908

div1.p: Von Mansfelde sends Mabel Lazear an update on preparations to pass a bill to support the widows and children of the Yellow Fever Commission.

div1.head: Letter from A.S. von Mansfelde to Mabel H. Lazear, January 14, 1908
div1.opener:
Nebraska State Medical Association
A. S. v. Mansfelde, M. D., Treasurer
“Quality Hill,” Ashland, Nebraska
No. 2807.
January 14th 1908.
Dear Mrs Lazear:
div1.p:
First let me tell you that
you are not doing very effective “praying”; I remind-
ed you of the necessity in my last letter. Well
I have been abed almost all the time since
January 1st with a catarrhal pneumonia,
too much to allow me to do much work
of any kind. However I have succeeded to
have excellent correspondence with Dr. John. C.
Hemmeter of Baltimore and also with Mr
Mead of the N. Y. Merchants Ass and Surgeon
General OReilly; who has a Memorandum
ready to send to the President, upon which
The latter will base a message to Congress
in behalf of your and Mrs Carrolls pension
bills. Your bills are S.1168 by Sen. P.C.
Knox and House Roll 4375 by Mr E. H.
Hinshaw and they are both in Committee
Do not in writing allude to the Surg. Gen
and the Presidents connection with these bills,
until this has actually happened. The S. G.s
Nebraska State Medical Association
A. S. v. Mansfelde, M. D., Treasurer
“Quality Hill,” Ashland, Nebraska
No._________
memorandum is held back until Mr Mead and
I say to send it to the President and I think
that time has come, when the Committees report-
the bills to their respective houses for passage.

I would not write this to you, if I was not
convinced that you can hold your own
council. I was delighted with your letter to
Mr Mead, it was an excellent one. However
I wanted you to know that things are moving
favorably. Note the enclosed circular letter
sent to 2400 Country Societies in the
U. St. Do you not think it ought to do
some good?

Well I am done for to-
day too weak to go on.

closer.salute:
With best wishes sincerely
your friend
